de.mnl.osgi.bnd.repository.maven.provider

Class NexusSearchOsgiRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.BaseRepository
      • aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.ResourcesRepository
        • de.mnl.osgi.bnd.repository.maven.provider.MavenOsgiRepository
          • de.mnl.osgi.bnd.repository.maven.provider.NexusSearchOsgiRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.service.repository.Repository

    public class NexusSearchOsgiRepository
extends MavenOsgiRepository
    Provide an OSGi repository (a collection of Resources, see Repository), filled with the results of performing a search on a Nexus server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NexusSearchOsgiRepository

        public NexusSearchOsgiRepository(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.net.URL server,
                                 java.io.File localRepo,
                                 java.io.File obrIndexFile,
                                 java.io.File mvnResposFile,
                                 java.lang.String queryString,
                                 int searchBreadth,
                                 int chunkSize,
                                 aQute.service.reporter.Reporter reporter,
                                 aQute.bnd.http.HttpClient client)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new instance that uses the provided information/resources to perform its work.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        server - the url of the Nexus server
        localRepo - the local Maven repository (cache)
        obrIndexFile - the persistent representation of this repository's content
        mvnResposFile - the mvn respos file
        queryString - the query string
        searchBreadth - the search breadth
        chunkSize - the chunk size
        reporter - a reporter for reporting the progress
        client - an HTTP client for obtaining information from the Nexus server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs
